walletsTitle: Your Wallet Settings and Standard Subscriptions

tokens.title: Fungible Tokens and NFTs
tokens.description: By default, subscribe to all communications from the tokens in this wallet. You can unsubscribe from specific tokens under <0>Subscriptions</0>.

spo.title: Delegated Stake Pools (SPOs)
spo.description: By default, subscribe to all communications from the Stake Pool Operators this wallet is delegated to. You can unsubscribe from specific pools under <0>Subscriptions</0>.

drep.title: Delegated Representatives (dReps)
drep.description: By default, subscribe to all communications from your delegated representatives. You can unsubscribe from specific dReps under <0>Subscriptions</0>.
